title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: No results are displayed when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that the search should display relevant results when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Package view in the application.
2. Right-click on a package and select the 'Search' option from the context menu.
3. In the search dialog that appears, enter a search query for declarations.
4. Click on the 'Search' button.
5. Verify that no results are displayed.

Expected result:
The search should display relevant results for declarations in the selected package.
